mapper.select: SELECT order_id, order_status, TO_CHAR(created_at, 'YYYY-MM-DD') AS created_at, order_detail_id, isbn, quantity, delivery_status, book_title, subtotal, coupon_id, coupon_code FROM ( SELECT rownum AS rank, a.* FROM ( SELECT o.order_id, o.order_status, o.created_at, d.order_detail_id, d.isbn, d.subtotal, d.coupon_id, d.quantity, d.delivery_status, b.book_title, c.coupon_code FROM orders o JOIN orders_detail d ON o.order_id = d.order_id JOIN book b ON d.isbn = b.isbn LEFT JOIN coupon c ON d.coupon_id = c.coupon_id WHERE o.user_id = #{user_id, jdbcType=VARCHAR} ORDER BY o.created_at DESC ) a ) WHERE rank > #{start} AND rank <= #{end}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM orders_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id WHERE o.user_id = #{userId}
select coupon_code from coupon where coupon_id=#{coupon_id}
mapper.update: update orders_detail set delivery_status=2 where order_detail_id=#{orders_detail}
mapper.select: select u.user_name, u.phone, o.address, o.address_detail,od.order_detail_id, o.zipcode from orders_detail od join orders o ON od.order_id = o.order_id join users u ON o.user_id = u.user_id where od.order_detail_id =#{order_detail_id}

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, od.ORDER_ID, od.ISBN, od.QUANTITY, od.DELIVERY_STATUS, o.USER_ID, o.CREATED_AT FROM orders_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID WHERE od.DELIVERY_STATUS = #{ans} ORDER BY o.CREATED_AT DESC ) a WHERE rownum < #{end} ) WHERE rn > #{start} ORDER BY rn

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM rn, a.* FROM ( SELECT od.ORDER_DETAIL_ID, od.ORDER_ID, od.ISBN, od.QUANTITY, od.DELIVERY_STATUS, o.USER_ID, o.CREATED_AT FROM orders_detail od JOIN orders o ON od.ORDER_ID = o.ORDER_ID ORDER BY o.CREATED_AT DESC ) a WHERE rownum < #{end} ) WHERE rn > #{start} ORDER BY rn
select count(order_detail_id) from orders_detail where delivery_status = #{count}
update orders_detail set delivery_status = #{delivery_status} where order_detail_id = #{order_detail_id} and order_id = #{order_id}
